upcomingSubtitle: Stay tuned for our next community gatherings
ctaDescription: We support community initiatives. Reach out to us!

descriptions.upcoming: Coming soon — details to be announced.
descriptions.ethcon2024: "Ignite your Cypherpunk Vision" — The 4th non-profit Ethereum developer conference. Developers, researchers, and students discussing the cypherpunk vision together.
descriptions.ethcon2023: "Proof of Sharing" — Vitalik Buterin as headline guest. A 3-day event combining hackathon and conference.
descriptions.ethcon2020: "Explore the Network of Opportunities!" — Global speakers including Vitalik Buterin, Sandeep Nailwal (Polygon), 0xMaki (SushiSwap), and Sebastien Borget (The Sandbox).
descriptions.ethcon2019: "Discover the Light" — The first non-profit Ethereum developer conference with 60 speakers and 500 attendees. Featuring Ethereum 101, Vyper & Solidity workshops.
